content: This is the place to ask questions about the connectathon that is on now!
@David Hay could you drop the google spreadsheet link here please
Permissions on the confluence site now is open to all users; so can add material as needed.
Feel free to add pages as children to the main event page.

Any problem with using the Connectathon Testing Thread on the main IPS Stream to provide some continuity with previous and future ISP Connectathons? https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/207835-IPS/topic/Connectathon.20Testing
@Brian Postlethwaite can you please post the URL of the Australian SMART spec here?

Core FHIR SMART App Launch Spec:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/smart-app-launch

Australian FHIR SMART App Launch Walkthrough:
https://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/FHIR+SMART+App+Launch+Walkthrough

Test Host App:
https://launch.smarthealthit.org/

Test SMART Client:
https://smartqedit4.azurewebsites.net/ts/Tester/smart-launch.html

If you want the test host and test client as a single URL:
https://launch.smarthealthit.org/ehr.html?app=https%3A%2F%2Fsmartqedit4.azurewebsites.net%2Fts%2FTester%2Fsmart-launch.html%3Flaunch%3DeyJhIjoiMSIsImUiOiI2MGM5ZmU2My1kOWU2LTRlNWUtOGQ1Yy1mOTFiN2ZjNzU0MTkiLCJmIjoiMSJ9%26iss%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Flaunch.smarthealthit.org%252Fv%252Fr4%252Ffhir&user=60c9fe63-d9e6-4e5e-8d5c-f91b7fc75419
What's the status of android SHC support? Was it approved for Aus?

What's the status of android SHC support? Was it approved for Aus?

I believe it was, yes. at least, I saw the paperwork

For those wondering where today's link is, follow the zoom link on the connectathon page
https://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/AFR/2021-11+Virtual+Connectathon
@Heath Frankel , excellent presentation on the smart MBS 715 form.. is there a way to get a copy of the presentation and any further documentation?
sure, email me heath@frankelinfosystems.com. I'll just confirm with Kate that it is OK but I am sure it will be. Send me the email as a reminder.
